/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a sweeping view of the street below. The street is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, their leaves forming a verdant canopy overhead. A white car is seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise tranquil scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, the calm waters of a lake can be seen, adding a serene element to the bustling cityscape. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of urban life and natural beauty that characterizes Beijing.
